description: This file is a header file defining the API for the Http Ato Header object, including function prototypes for creation, removal, enrollment, and initialization functions within an HTTP implementation.

methods.name: HttpCreateAtoHeader
methods.description: Function prototype for creating an Ato Header object, initializing it with container, owner, and reserved contexts.

methods.name: HttpAtoHeaderCreate
methods.description: Function prototype for creating an instance of the Ato Header object, with context parameters.

methods.name: HttpAtoHeaderRemove
methods.description: Function prototype for removing the Ato Header object instance.

methods.name: HttpAtoHeaderEnrollObjects
methods.description: Function prototype for enrolling objects necessary for the Ato Header object.

methods.name: HttpAtoHeaderInitialize
methods.description: Function prototype for initializing the Ato Header object.
